content.p: Thank you for your interest in working for our University. For more information about a specific job vacancy you will find contact details listed at the bottom of the job advertisement. If you need assistance with the job application, please contact our HR Recruitment Team quoting the job title and reference number on: telephone : +44 (0)115 748 4800 email : hr@nottingham.ac.uk Please note that we do not accept speculative employment requests or CVs by email. You can view current opportunities on our job page and submit application online.
